attributes.additional_details: It is high time that the government seriously addressed the on-going and current issues surrounding the appalling lack of discipline that is ever present within our schools today. School bullying wherein the perpetrators have a total disregard for current behaviour management schemes needs to be thoroughly addressed forthwith. The present educational climate in relation to pupil/bullying issues and discipline must be dealt with. I say bring back decent moral standards and corporal punishment, before it is too late.
